nodes.text: The Ice Speeder is an airspeeder design used by the Grand Army of the Republic.

The Ice Speeder is a Grand Army of the Republic transport airspeeder design modified for use in cold weather operations. It features insulation, under panel heating, and advanced de-icing technology, along with S-foils, reinforced armor, and a pair of blaster cannons. It can reach speeds of 800 k/h with twin propulsion thrusters and mounts a tractor beam. The speeder is piloted by one individual, who also acts as the gunner.
Commander Gree used one during the Battle for the Stolen Crystals.
The Ice Speeder appears in the 2013 comic/LEGO set LEGO Star Wars Brickmaster: Battle for the Stolen Crystals.
